snippet: The Nets blew a 22-point lead in the second half, against a depleted Minnesota team, for their first defeat of the season and the first in their new home in Brooklyn.
abstract: Minnesota Timberwolves defeat Brooklyn Nets, 107-96, after Nets blow 22-point lead in second half in their first loss of season and first loss in their new Barclays Center arena.
lead_paragraph: The Nets blew a 22-point lead in the second half, against a depleted Minnesota team, for their first defeat of the season and the first in their new home in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Nets Lose to Timberwolves in Brooklyn
headline.main: Nets Blow 22-Point Lead at Home in First Loss
headline.print_headline: Nets Blow 22-Point Lead at Home in First Loss
